channel.title: [PI][REP+++] Quick Prayer Problem [Help]
channel.description:
Well basicly the client freezes when i right click and select "select quick prayers", i have no idea why it does this...
Turn on and off quick prayers works, when i "select quick prayers" it dc/freeze's me out the game (deregistered from server), and gives this error:
[CODE]################# Project Ecko Client V5.0 Thank You Kurdz ################# response:2 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:10985) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:3050) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10745) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11732) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:173) at client.run(client.java:6504) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/CODE]
It was working fine, and i have checked those lines, everything seems ok, i dont know why its giving this freezing error.
I dont think it has anything to do with the T1 error, thats always been there, never knew how to fix that =/.
[B]I AM WILLING TO PAY IN RSGP[/B]
